title: Above regulation shall be applicable to all the buildings (i
clause_text: Above regulation shall be applicable to all the buildings (i.e. newly proposed buildings as well as old buildings for utilization of FSI) in TOD.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Above regulation shall be applicable to all the buildings (i.e. newly proposed buildings as well as old buildings for utilization of FSI) in TOD.
